metadata.title: CVE-2024-1546 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When storing and re-accessing data on a networking channel, the length ofbuffers may have been confused, resulting in an out-of-bounds memory read.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 123, Firefox ESR < 115.8, andThunderbird < 115.8.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
